name: pomodorobattery
description: my take on the Pomodoro Technique where the clock/ time tracker is represented as a battery that will slowly loose power. Users can select from a test time(a few seconds), 5 mins, 10mins, 15 mins. On timer End a message and alarm will sound to remind you to breathe and go take a break('Go recharge your battery).ENJOY!
author: Dwayne Bynum
